ingredients.item: Finely grated zest and juice 4 unwaxed limes
5 mint leaves, plus extra to garnish

instructions.step: Place the cream, sugar and lime zest into a saucepan. Scrunch the mint leaves in your hand and add them too. Heat gently until the sugar has dissolved, then simmer gently for 3 minutes. Remove from the heat, stir in the lime juice, then sieve the mixture into a jug. Set aside.
Place 100g raspberries in a fine sieve set over a mixing bowl or jug. Press with a wooden spoon through the sieve to extract a purée. Discard the seeds.
Have 6 glasses or ramekins (about 175ml each) ready. Stir the raspberry purée through the cream mixture so it’s just marbled, then divide between the glasses or ramekins.
Chill for at least 6 hours or ideally overnight. When ready to serve garnish with the remaining 50g raspberries and few small mint leaves.
